original_text: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.
korean_text: 또 이르시되 너희가 너희 전통을 지키려고 하나님의 계명을 잘 저버리는도다

sentences.original_text: Full well ye reject the commandment of God
that ye may keep your own tradition
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희 자신의 전통을 지키기 위해서라도
